name: Race Elcano
description:
The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Everything wonderful that sounds is inversely proportional to the result of this new vehicle. To celebrate its launch, a racing championship for these vehicles is held with a prize of one million dollars for the winner.

Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive. Championship of 12 circuits with 5 selectable drivers with their own story. Local multiplayer mode with up to 4 players in split screen.
